title: First love
brief_description: First Love is a story about 2 teenagers, discovering “first love” and each others bodies. A secret meeting in a school workshop leads to an intimate encounter and the exchange of rings. A tale of discovery, exploration, facination and body piercing that has delighted film festival audiences in Australia, Sweden, Spain and the United States.
